div.div: at Westminster, Md. | Kenneth R. Gill

tr.td: MCD wins toss, defers. DC will receive. MCD will defend S end zone.
S. Wiersberg kickoff 45 yards to the DC20, R. Klingerman return 19 yards to the DC39 (N Godfrey).
Billy Burger at QB for Dickinson.
Malcolm Davis rush for 1 yard to the DC40 (C Richardson; Andy Ullmann).
Billy Burger pass complete to Kyle Donahue for 4 yards to the DC44 (Matt Quattrone; Chris Inge).
